quote: If he says he doesn't love you anymore and does love this other woman, you've got to accept it. Maybe he will come back, maybe he won't, but either way, you've got to live through this.
quote_letters: IF HE SAYS HE DOESNT LOVE YOU ANYMORE AND DOES LOVE THIS OTHER WOMAN YOUVE GOT TO ACCEPT IT MAYBE HE WILL COME BACK MAYBE HE WONT BUT EITHER WAY YOUVE GOT TO LIVE THROUGH THIS
